lead_paragraph: British Cycling technical director Shane Sutton resigned on Wednesday after being engulfed in a row about sexist and discriminatory remarks he is alleged to have made.

headline.print_headline: Sutton Quits as British Cycling Chief Amid Discrimination Row
headline.main: Sutton Quits as British Cycling Chief Amid Discrimination Row

snippet: British Cycling technical director Shane Sutton resigned on Wednesday after being engulfed in a row about sexist and discriminatory remarks he is alleged to have made....
